content.p: at undergraduate level we offer a BA in Modern Languages with Translation all of our courses are available on a full-time or part-time basis we use state-of-the-art interpreting facilities which have been built to the same specifications as those used by the UN in Geneva Find out more about undergraduate study we offer expert supervision for projects involving English and the following languages: French, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Chinese, Arabic, Russian. Find out more about postgraduate study Discover our research See more about members of staff in Translation Studies, their research interests and areas of research supervision. Find our academic staff
